item.title: Psychonauts Problem
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
“Helicopters can up and down. They can go sideways too but not as fast as planes.”

Genius.

Anyway, as pointed out, this problem has little information on the internet. Thankfully I have found a perfect temp fix. Minimizing the game, then maximizing again…weird.

item.title: Psychonauts Problem
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
FireTime:

2 possibilities
*Your game is corrupted
fix: remove it and re-download the game

Impossible. Steam does a check of the integrity of the game files before launch; if they aren’t 100% the same as the files on the server, then the game wont start. Redownloading the files will achieve nothing.

I’d bank on it being a graphics card driver issue. The fact that its inconsistent bugs me…

brokenfridgehinge:

How good is this game, holy shit. The Milkman Conspiracy was just bizzare.

I am a road crew worker; here is my sign.

Read full topic

item.title: Psychonauts Problem
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
2 possibilities
*Your game is corrupted
fix: remove it and re-download the game

  • hardware issue
    fix: update your graphics drivers, update your system, check for compatibility issues with your hardware and the game, Check for faulty hardware.

And as Mangled said check the steem forums, [COLOR=‘DimGray’]i[/SIZE]$10 says some one has the exact same problem as you and some one has already posted a fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Psychonauts Problem
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
I recently bought Psychonauts from Steam. The game ran fine for a while(up until Lungfishopolis) and it still does sometimes. Though I have been getting this annoying problem;

Every so often Raz will turn completely white(no textures) and all NPC models will dissapear. I have also noticed that the floor in the Theater turns red and black. The pause screen is also invisible.

Can anyone help me with this problem? I am running the game on an ATI Radeon HD 4870.

Read full topic
